svg.text: Jakarta River Monitoring Station - System Overview
AC-Powered PoE Camera System with 24hr UPS | OpenRiverCam Indonesia Spring 2026 | Training/Demo Site
COMPUTE ENCLOSURE (Aluminum, oversized for thermal mass)
1. Stack Order: Pi 5 (bottom) -> Witty Pi 5 HAT+ (middle) -> Pi-EzConnect (top)
2. Apply MG 422C silicone conformal coat to: Pi 5, Witty Pi 5, Pi-EzConnect, all exposed PCBs
3. Mean Well SDR-120-12: DIN rail mount, 88-264V AC input, SEMI F47 voltage sag immunity
4. LiFePO4 Battery: Keep in shaded area of enclosure, BMS provides Bluetooth monitoring
5. Victron BatteryProtect: Configure LVD @ 11.5V disconnect, 12.8V reconnect, prevents deep discharge
6. Planet IPOE-260-12V: Native 12V input (no DC-DC converter needed), handles both cameras easily
7. PTC Heaters: Self-regulating, no runaway risk. Enclosure heater uses hygrostat, camera uses thermostat
8. All outdoor cable penetrations: IP68 feedthrough connectors, Cat6 outdoor shielded cable
9. Passive cooling strategy: Oversized aluminum enclosure, shaded mounting, Gore vents for pressure equalization
GPIO4/17: Witty Pi (reserved) | GPIO17: Green LED | GPIO27: Yellow LED | GPIO22: Red LED
GPIO5: Maintenance button (input, internal pullup) | GPIO2/3: I2C SDA/SCL (rain gauge @ 0x1D)
Main: 10A MCB | Witty Pi: 5A | PoE Injector: 5A | Enclosure Heater: 3A | Camera Heaters: 2A
